title: MF ROTARY RAKES VS. WHEEL RAKES

tasks.task: Operate a rotary rake compared to a wheel rake for hay management.
subtasks: Adjust tools to manage windrow formation.
Demonstrate even hay feeding to balers.
Explain advantages of drying in the windrow.
Compares baling speeds with different rakes.
Discuss initial investment versus long-term benefits.
Describe windrow fluffiness and optimal conditions.
Differentiate raking wheel mechanisms (rotary vs. V-Rake).
